page.shortlink: api desktop api object class menu item enable function
page.description: Enables or disables a menu entry.

argument.name: menuitem
argument.description: The text of a menu entry.

item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.MENUITEMENABLE() method enables or disables (grays) a menu entry.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example enables the Highlight Keywords entry in the Find menu.
section.example: dim ptr as P ptr = form.load("Customer Information") ptr.show() ptr.MenuItemenable("Highlight Keywords", .T.)
